structure.unit: ARTICLE XVII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY LOCKSMITH ORDINANCE

text.section:
Sec. 8A-360. Registration of locksmith business.
Unless otherwise exempt pursuant to provisions of this article, no person shall operate a locksmith business in Miami-Dade County, Florida without first obtaining a registration from the Director pursuant to this article and maintaining such registration as required herein.
Any person who operates a locksmith business in Miami-Dade County shall obtain registration annually or biannually from the Director.
